Speaker: Evil Man
Text: Just as I thought. What about the Ninja?

Speaker: Ninja
Text: What shall we do about the Ninja Dragon, sire?

Speaker: Evil Man
Text: Nothing. No further need for him. At least, not for now. Follow the plan exactly. Now, go.

Speaker: Evil Man
Text: ... The time shall come... When the Gate of Darkness shall be cast open... All men shall kneel before me… All shall hail me, Ashtar, as their new master! HA HA HA HA...
They told me you were good.
Go to the Tower of Lahja, if you want to save the girl.

Speaker: Man in sunglasses
Text: Yes... Irene. No time to lose, Hayabusa... Move it out.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: But who are you? What the...?
[Man in sunglasses take out a gun and shot, however, he was aiming not at Ryu, but at a zombie behind him.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Who are you? What the...? Where'd he go?

Speaker: Man in sunglasses
Text: C'mon Hayabusa. You may be the only one who can beat them. But there's no chance unless you hurry.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You tried to ambush me. Who are you?

Speaker: Boss
Text: We are tribesmen from the world of Chaos, lead by the Emperor of Darkness, Ashtar...

Speaker: Boss
Text: The end of your life draws near, Ninja Dragon.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I must find Irene before it's too late.

Speaker: Irene?
Text: I see you are still alive, Ninja.
[He shot a ball of light at Ryu.]

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: Ha, ha, I find it hard to believe... that a weakling like you was able to defeat Jaquio.

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: Some warrior you turned out to be. Die, little Ninja.

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: What the...? Who are you? How did you get in here, you sewer rat?

Speaker: Man with sunglasses
Text: Hand over the Sword and surrender. This tower is completely surrounded.

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: Ha, ha ha, If you want the Sword, you'll have to follow me... into the Maze of Darkness.

Speaker: Man with sunglasses
Text: It's called the Sword of Chaos, grown out of the bone of the Demon. The same way your sword is supposed to come from the fang of the Dragon.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: How can that be? How do you know...?

Speaker: Man with sunglasses
Text: The name's Robert. I'm with Special Intelligence, U.S. Army. We have to stop Ashtar before his sword reaches full strength... at any cost. Hurry, Ryu. Hit Ashtar in the underground maze.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What is he after? What does he want from me?

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: Come out and fight. Or the girl gets it.

Speaker: Irene
Text: Don't do it Ryu. They'll kill you!

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: Show yourself. Or are you too much of a coward! Ha, ha, ha, ha...

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You fiend. Irene, I'll save you.

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: To the one who releases Darkness with the immortal blood, he shall receive the Power of the Almighty Evil. The legend shall come true. This earth shall fall into shadow and the demons of evil shall rule forever. Hm, hm, hm, hm... Ha, ha, ha, ha!

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: At last, the foolish little Ninja is ready to fight. Take the girl.

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: Ha, ha, ha, ha. See how the Sword of Chaos trembles with delight!
[Ashtar shots a ball of light at Robert.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Robert, take care of Irene. Ashtar!

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: So, your inner power is beginning to show itself eh? But you know you can never touch me with a sword so filled with hatred. Fool!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Enough of your games, Ashtar. This is between you and me.

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: You dare to do battle with Ashtar? Foolish Ninja. I'll show you just how powerless you really are.

Speaker: Ashtar
Text: ... Aaargh... The Force of Darkness shall soon awaken. No one will be able to stop it. Join forces, Shadow of Chaos. Swallow this world into Eternal Darkness…

Speaker: Irene
Text: Ryu, there's an altar... up ahead... somewhere... you must... destroy it.

Speaker: Irene
Text: I'll be all right. You are the only one who can do it... the only one who can stop them. Go... hurry.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Alright... I'll go, Irene. But I'll come back for you as soon as I can. Hold on. Robert, take Irene and get out of here now.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You too, friend. Take care of her.

Speaker: Robert
Text: You all right? You wanna rest a while?
[A huge man appears from the darkness.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I've fought this creature before. How could this be...?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Robert?! What happened? Are you all right?

Speaker: Robert
Text: Ryu, if the Gate of Darkness is opened, the Tribe from the dark world will cause chaos. That'll be the end of all mankind. Hm? ...Listen!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: They're coming again. And there are quite a few of them.

Speaker: Robert
Text: I'll stay here and hold them off. Ryu, you get going.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You're wounded. I can't leave you alone...

Speaker: Robert
Text: Don't worry about me. Go! You're the only one who can stop their evil plan now. Now move!

Speaker: Robert
Text: Don't forget to save the girl while you're at it. Go... get going!

Speaker: Robert
Text: OK, you freaks. Come and get it! You're going to dream your worst nightmare. No one ever gets past old “Jungle Rat” Rob!

Speaker: Robert
Text: So... this is the end of the road, eh? It's dark... everything's getting cloudy. Ryu. Get'em... for me.
It's been a long time, Ryu Hayabusa.

Speaker: Jaquio
Text: One can never destroy the Power of Evil. The spirit released after our battle flowed into my body. I am reborn. And I've got the dark Power of Evil.

Speaker: Jaquio
Text: The spirit you defeated before was nothing more than a pawn. Your battle served only to awaken the ancient, true Spirits of Evil. The Sword of Chaos simply sucks up your life force. And when the Sword of Chaos awakens, the Gate of Darkness shall be thrown open... And the demon shall come back to life.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What are you going to do with Irene?

Speaker: Jaquio
Text: Her life force shall be used to call up the demons. You shall awaken them, she shall call them back to earth. You should be proud. You two shall make the beginning of a new Age. The Age of Eternal Darkness! Hm, hm, hm, hm. Ha, ha, ha, ha.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Are you finished? I’ve had enough of your speeches. And I’ve had enough of YOU!

Speaker: Jaquio
Text: Then fight, Ninja Dragon – the last of your clan. Now, we shall decide whether Light or... Darkness is to be the true master!!

Speaker: Irene
Text: ...We've got to... destroy this altar... Ryu!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: The Sword! The Sword has been awakened by the blood of Jacquio!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Huff... huff. Is this finally the end of it all? How do I fight such an enemy? Father. Sword of the Dragon Clan. Give me strength. Demon! You're mine. Taste the true power of the Dragon Sword!
[Chaos Sword shatters. The Altar is crumbling.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Irene... I'm so sorry. My clan... defeating the demons... none of that matters... now that you're gone…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Wh... ? The Sword! The Dragon Sword... ...? What the...

Speaker: Irene
Text: Ryu. What... what happened to me? I feel like I've been dreaming... for a long time.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: It's all right... it's over. It's all over, Irene. The Darkness is gone.

Speaker: Irene
Text: Oh, Ryu… then… it's true. The part about... you and I... isn't it?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yes, Irene. Look, can you see how beautiful our world is, Irene? And it'll stay like this... forever.
